app.name: NutriPilot
landing.heroSubtitle: Generate weekly meal plans optimized for your budget and protein targets. No more expensive grocery bills or monotonous diets.
landing.heroNote: No credit card required ‚Ä¢ 1 free optimization per week
landing.sectionScreenshotsSubtitle: Preview the exact screens you'll use every week.
landing.featureGoalsDesc: Choose your fitness goal (cutting, maintenance, bulking), set your budget, and customize preferences.
landing.featureOptimizeDesc: Our Smart Savings Mode maximizes protein-per-cost while maintaining diet variety. No "tuna only" diets.
landing.featureListDesc: Organized by category, shows total cost, savings, and protein. Export to PDF for supermarket trips.
landing.sectionPricingSubtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you want unlimited Smart Savings.
landing.testimonial1.quote: I cut my grocery time in half and still hit my macros every week.
landing.testimonial1.name: Lucas S.
landing.testimonial2.quote: The Smart Savings swaps are spot-on. No more decision fatigue.
landing.testimonial2.name: Marina T.
landing.testimonial3.quote: Finally a planner that respects my diet and my budget.
landing.testimonial3.name: Andre P.
landing.benefitBudgetDesc: Automatically substitutes expensive items with cheaper alternatives while maintaining macros
landing.benefitDiversityDesc: Maintains minimum 2 different protein sources. No monotonous diets that kill adherence
landing.benefitPersonalDesc: Exclude foods you don't like or can't eat. The optimizer respects your preferences
landing.benefitTransparentDesc: Shows exactly what was substituted and why. Honest messaging when budget is impossible
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Save Money & Hit Your Protein Target?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Start planning your first week for free
landing.ctaNote: Free tier: 1 optimization/week ‚Ä¢ Premium: Unlimited + PDF export (‚Ç¨9.99/month)
planner.title: Build your Nutrition Plan
planner.subtitle: Meal-prep optimized ‚Ä¢ Protein-first ‚Ä¢ Cost transparent

premium.savings.title: Cheapest High-Protein Swap Mode
premium.savings.headline: Smart Savings Mode for protein-first swaps
premium.savings.description: Free users get 1 Smart Savings optimization per week. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited swap rounds while preserving protein targets and diet variety.
premium.savings.cta: You have {{count}} free optimization(s) this week
premium.pdf.title: Export Your Shopping List to PDF
premium.pdf.headline: Take your list to the supermarket
premium.pdf.description: Premium users can export professionally formatted shopping lists to PDF. Perfect for printing or sharing on WhatsApp.
premium.note: Payment integration coming soon. This is a demo of premium features.
premium.continueFree: Continue with free tier ({{count}} remaining this week)
premium.modal.title: Unlock your NutriPilot Pro Experience
premium.modal.headline.unlimitedFoodRota: Re-roll proteins and meals every week to prevent repetition fatigue.
premium.modal.headline.weeklyCoachAdjust: Auto-adjust next week based on adherence and repetition feedback.
premium.modal.headline.recipePacksPrepPd: Unlock premium recipe packs and export your prep guide + shopping docs.
premium.modal.description.recipePacksPre: Free: basic recipes and no prep PDF
premium.modal.benefits.unlimitedFoodRota: Rotate proteins every week without repeating the same base foods
Keep macro targets stable while swapping ingredients
Reduce adherence drop from menu fatigue
premium.modal.benefits.weeklyCoachAdjust: Adjust next week based on Yes / Partial / No adherence
Automatically simplify plan when consistency drops
Increase variety when repetition risk is detected
premium.modal.benefits.recipePacksPrepPd: Unlock premium recipe packs built for meal prep
Export shopping list and prep workflow as PDF
Share or print complete prep instructions
prepGuide.title: Sunday Meal Prep Guide
prepGuide.emptySubtitle: Generate a weekly meal plan first to see your Sunday prep guide.
prepGuide.lockedSubtitle: Complete your Grocery Mission to unlock Monday Prep.
prepGuide.checklistSubtitle: Follow these steps in order for the smoothest prep session
prepGuide.upgradeTitle: Unlock Recipe Packs + Prep Guide PDF
prepGuide.upgradeSubtitle: Premium gives full recipe packs plus printable prep flow for your Sunday ritual.
prepGuide.completionSubtitle: You're all set for the week. Great job!
prepGuide.instructions.stovetop: Cook {{quantity}} {{ingredient}} on stovetop for about {{duration}} min.
prepGuide.instructions.chop: Wash and chop {{quantity}} {{ingredient}}, then store in containers.
prepGuide.instructions.raw: Prepare {{quantity}} {{ingredient}} raw and store safely for the week.
prepGuide.tips.containers: You'll need around {{count}} meal containers. Glass works best for reheating.
prepGuide.tips.parallel: Start oven proteins and boiling grains at the same time to save time.
prepGuide.tips.labels: Label containers by day and meal type (Mon-Lunch, Tue-Dinner, etc.).
prepGuide.tips.freeze: Freeze part of the meals to keep freshness throughout the week.
prepGuide.tips.fridge: Keep meals in the fridge; most stay good for 4-5 days.
prepGuide.tips.vegetables: Prepare vegetables at the end to keep them fresher and crunchier.
prepGuide.tips.rice: Cook rice in larger batches; it reheats very well.
prepGuide.tips.chicken: Season chicken before baking (salt, pepper, garlic powder is a great base).
onboarding.step1Subtitle: Your coach starts with sex and age to estimate metabolism correctly.
onboarding.step2Subtitle: Weight and height tune your calorie and macro calculations.
onboarding.step3Subtitle: Tell your coach if you train regularly so we adjust intensity.
onboarding.step4Subtitle: Choose the direction your plan should optimize for this week.
onboarding.step5Subtitle: Number of meals defines how your macros are distributed.
onboarding.step6Subtitle: Add preferences or restrictions so the plan feels made for you.
onboarding.coachReadySubtitle: Finish to generate your adaptive weekly plan.
onboarding.errors.generic: Please review the highlighted data and try again.
onboarding.errors.trains: Please confirm if you train regularly.
onboarding.errors.meals: Meals per day must be between 3 and 6.
premiumPage.title: ‚ú® NutriPilot Pro
premiumPage.subtitle: Know in 5 seconds why people pay: less repetition, better adherence, printable execution.
premiumPage.valueIntroSubtitle: Free gives a solid base. Premium gives the execution system.

premiumPage.free.feature6: Recipe Packs + Meal Prep Guide PDF
premiumPage.premium.title: Premium
premiumPage.premium.feature4: Recipe Packs + Meal Prep Guide PDF
premiumPage.premium.feature5: Faster weekly execution with less decision fatigue
premiumPage.faq.rotationBody: Prevents repeating the same proteins week after week while preserving your targets and budget constraints.
premiumPage.faq.coachBody: Reads your adherence and repetition signals, then adapts next week automatically for consistency.
premiumPage.faq.recipeTitle: Recipe Packs + Meal Prep Guide PDF
premiumPage.faq.recipeBody: Turns planning into execution with structured recipe packs and printable prep workflow.
premiumPage.ctaTitle: Start free, upgrade when repetition starts costing results.
premiumPage.ctaSubtitle: If you want less friction and better weekly adherence, Premium pays for itself in consistency.

landingV2.heroSubtitle: NutriPilot builds your grocery list based on your body, goals, and training.
landingV2.featuresTitle: Built like a real fitness coach
landingV2.feature1Desc: Plans adapt to sex, age, weight, height, training, and fitness goal.
landingV2.feature2Desc: You get consolidated quantities and practical shopping instructions in seconds.
landingV2.feature3Desc: Unlock adaptive coaching, food rotation, and prep guide PDF exports.
landingV2.quote1: Finally feels like a coach, not just another calorie app.
landingV2.quote2: I open it once and my week is organized.
landingV2.quote3: The premium flow made me understand exactly why to upgrade.
